ai.instructions:
- Mention bookmark titles as Markdown links that point to their URLs.
- Call `search-bookmarks` before answering any question about existing content so you rely on up-to-date data.
- If the user references a bookmark by title, search for it first and then call `get-bookmark-details` with the returned id to read its note or highlights.
- When the user wants to save a link, translate the requested collection name into an id using `list-collections` (unless the id is already provided) before calling `save-bookmark`. Default to the Unsorted collection (collectionId: -1) when nothing is specified.
- Include collection names and relevant tags in your answers so the user understands where the bookmark lives.
- Never add or change bookmark notes unless the user explicitly provides the text you should store.
